00051   const uint16_t DEFAULT_DFSBROKER_PORT = 38030;

00053   const char *usage[] = {
00054     "usage: cellStoreDump [OPTIONS] <fname>",
00055     "",
00056     "OPTIONS:",
00057     "  -a                Dump everything, including key/value pairs",
00058     "  -c,--count        Count the number of key/value pairs",
00059     "  --end-key=<key>   Ignore keys that are greater than <key>",
00060     "  --start-key=<key> Ignore keys that are less than or equal to <key>",
00061     "",
00062     "Dumps the contents of the CellStore contained in the DFS file <fname>.",
00063     0
00064   };
00065 }

00070 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00071   Comm *comm;
00072   ConnectionManagerPtr connManagerPtr;
00073   DfsBroker::Client *client;
00074   std::string fname = "";
00075   ByteString key, value;
00076   bool dump_all = false;
00077   CellStoreV0Ptr cellStorePtr;
00078   bool count_keys = false;
00079   uint64_t key_count = 0;
00080   std::string start_key, end_key;
00081   bool got_end_key = false;
00082   bool hit_start = false;
00083   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00084   string configFile = "";
00085   Key key_comps;
00086 
00087   ReactorFactory::initialize(1);
00088   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00089 
00090   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00091     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-a"))
00092       dump_all = true;
00093     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-c") || !strcmp(argv[i], "--count"))
00094       count_keys = true;
00095     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--start-key=", 12)) {
00096       start_key = &argv[i][12];
00097       boost::trim_if(start_key, boost::is_any_of("'\""));
00098     }
00099     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--end-key=", 10)) {
00100       end_key = &argv[i][10];
00101       boost::trim_if(end_key, boost::is_any_of("'\""));
00102       got_end_key = true;
00103     }
00104     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--help"))
00105       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00106     else if (fname == "")
00107       fname = argv[i];
00108     else
00109       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00110   }
00111 
00112   if (fname == "")
00113       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00114 
00115   if (configFile == "")
00116     configFile = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00117 
00118   props_ptr = new Properties(configFile);
00119 
00120   if (start_key == "")
00121     hit_start = true;
00122 
00123   comm = new Comm();
00124   connManagerPtr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00125 
00126   client = new DfsBroker::Client(connManagerPtr, props_ptr);
00127   if (!client->wait_for_connection(15)) {
00128     cerr << "error: timed out waiting for DFS broker" << endl;
00129     exit(1);
00130   }
00131 
00132   Global::blockCache = new FileBlockCache(200000000LL);
00133 
00137   cellStorePtr = new CellStoreV0(client);
00138   CellListScanner *scanner = 0;
00139 
00140   if (cellStorePtr->open(fname.c_str(), 0, 0) != 0)
00141     return 1;
00142 
00143   if (cellStorePtr->load_index() != 0)
00144     return 1;
00145 
00146 
00150   if (dump_all || count_keys) {
00151     ScanContextPtr scanContextPtr( new ScanContext(END_OF_TIME) );
00152 
00153     scanner = cellStorePtr->create_scanner(scanContextPtr);
00154     while (scanner->get(key, value)) {
00155       key_comps.load(key);
00156 
00157       if (!hit_start) {
00158         if (strcmp(key_comps.row, start_key.c_str()) <= 0) {
00159           scanner->forward();
00160           continue;
00161         }
00162         hit_start = true;
00163       }
00164       if (got_end_key && strcmp(key_comps.row, end_key.c_str()) > 0)
00165         break;
00166       if (count_keys)
00167         key_count++;
00168       else
00169         cout << key_comps << endl;
00170       scanner->forward();
00171     }
00172     delete scanner;
00173   }
00174 
00175   if (count_keys) {
00176     cout << key_count << endl;
00177     return 0;
00178   }
00179 
00183   cout << endl;
00184   cout << "BLOCK INDEX:" << endl;
00185   cellStorePtr->display_block_info();
00186 
00187 
00191   CellStoreTrailer *trailer = cellStorePtr->get_trailer();
00192 
00193   cout << endl;
00194   cout << "TRAILER:" << endl;
00195   cout << *trailer;
00196 
00197   cout << endl;
00198   cout << "OTHER:" << endl;
00199   cout << "split row '" << cellStorePtr->get_split_row() << "'" << endl;
00200 
00201   return 0;
00202 }
